name: cloudtrail-table-structure
text: What is the structure of the SAMPLE_DATABASE.SAMPLE_SCHEMA.SAMPLE_CLOUDTRAIL_TABLE table?
query:
SELECT column_name, data_type, comment
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_catalog = 'SAMPLE_DATABASE'
  AND table_schema = 'SAMPLE_SCHEMA'
  AND table_name = 'SAMPLE_CLOUDTRAIL_TABLE'
ORDER BY ordinal_position

meta.sql_description: Show column details (name, data type, comment) for table {table_name} in schema {table_schema} of catalog {table_catalog}

AND table_schema = 'SAMPLE_SCHEMA'

column names, data types,
and comments"] Q --> T1 T1 --> F1 F1 --> S1 S1 --> O1 O1 --> R
meta.sql_template:
SELECT column_name, data_type, comment
FROM information_schema.columns
WHERE table_catalog = ?
  AND table_schema = ?
  AND table_name = ?
ORDER BY ordinal_position
